trailingComments.value: Don't affix the sidebar if it is taller than the viewport (otherwise
there would be no way to scroll through its content).

leadingComments.value: Don't affix the sidebar if it is taller than the viewport (otherwise
there would be no way to scroll through its content).

trailingComments.value: Register the affix plugin to execute on every window resize (and trigger)

leadingComments.value: Register the affix plugin to execute on every window resize (and trigger)

*
 * Setup the sidebar DOM element to be affixed to the top of the viewport
 * using Bootstrap's affix plugin.
 *
 * @param {DOMElement} element
 * @param {Boolean} isInitialized
 * @param {Object} context
